I am an accredited member of the British Association for Counselling and Psychotherapy (BACP) and adhere to their [Ethical Framework](https://www.bacp.co.uk/media/3103/bacp-ethical-framework-for-the-counselling-professions-2018.pdf). I hold a Postgraduate Diploma in Psychosynthesis Counselling, validated by the University of East London. I have an on-going interest in psychoanalysis and hold an MA in Psychoanalytic Studies from Birkbeck, University of London.
